nodes.bodyText: The default is false? (And needs to be for backwards-compatibility reasons).
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -185,6 +185,10 @@ Maximum length of characters in a gram. Defaults to `2`.
 (Optional, integer)
 Minimum length of characters in a gram. Defaults to `1`.
 
+`preserve_original`::
+(Optional, boolean)
+If set to true then it would also emit the original token. Defaults to `true`.
+
